features: 【1 in 1 Battery Desk Fan】This rechargeable fan comes along with a 5000mAh battery that even can last up to 5-26H hours when fully charged. Powerful portable fan and 5000 battery capacity convenient for your indoor & outdoor use.

【2 in 1 Camping Fan Travel Fan】The camping fan has 3 brightness settings, Providing you with the light source you need outdoors at night. The light is soft and non-glare light, It is an ideal light source for night camping or hiking! The 6.5-inch compact design could easily fit in your bag or luggage for traveling.

【3 in 1 Standing Fan - Ultra Stable】Telescopic, detachable and height adjustable tripod base, which can be used as a desktop fan 5.8"(14.7cm) or a pedestal fan 24"(60cm), easily meets your different needs for a fan's height.
【4 in 1 Air Oscillating Fan 】Featuring 180° tilt-back head and oscillation left or right 75°. You can direct the wind to where you want the most, it can effectively accelerate the air circulation.
【Super quiet bathroom fan and Strong air movement】Hangable design fits easily with your bathroom hooks. Recommended for use in small bathroom.

【Powerful 4 Speeds & Washable Fan Guard】: 4 speeds more choice for your optional. The max wind speed up to 4600RPM. Clockwise to remove Fan Guard and turn it counter-clockwise to put it back on. Cleaning the fan guard will extend its lifespan.

【EasyAcc 36-month Warranty 】EasyAcc specializes in the FAN industry over 10 years, with advanced and mature techniques, quality is guaranteed and worth trust. We provide a 36-month warranty, no worry click to add to the shopping cart!

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Tired of getting kinds of fans for your desk, bedroom, living room, or travel? Full of kinds of fans at home? If so, EasyAcc 4 in 1 multifunctional portable fan is extremely convenient to adapt to your different needs. Why Choose EasyAcc Battery Operated Portable fan? Compact Size: 6.5 in fan cover with detachable base, easily fit in your bag or luggage for traveling. 5 - 26H Working Time: Built-in 5000 customized battery, Provide enough power support for your indoor outdoor activities. Camping Fan with LED lights: 3 brightness settings, an ideal light source for night camping or hiking! Ultra Stable Standing Fan: Adjustable telescopic rod, which provides you more choices in different heights and angles, extremely convenient to adapt to different needs. Air Oscillating Fan: Featuring 180° tilt-back head and oscillation left or right 75°.
For Office Desk For Kitchen For Bedroom Living Room

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 16, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I love this little fan! Bought it for a small bedroom. There is an attic entrance in the ceiling to my bedroom so I do not have the option to install a ceiling fan. Didn't want or need anything large that would take up floor place and get in the way. I just wanted something to move the air around and keep my bedroom from feeling stale. This fan is exactly what I needed. It moves a lot of air for its small size even on the low setting. It is small enough to fit inside the bottom shelf of my nightstand. You can hear it but it isn't loud or distracting. The outside shell is all metal and feels solid. The fan blades are clear abs plastic. The fan grills are spaced close enough to keep small objects and fingers from accidentally hitting the blades. The grills are also spaced wide enough to easily clean the fan blades off with compressed air. It looks very nice. Comes with a usb cord that I plugged into my surge protector. Works well. I highly recommend this fan and I would buy it again. The bronze version of this fan is perfect for Bohemian and other decor styles where modern plastic looking devices might stand out too much.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I deal for circulation in and area of my Motorhome that dot damp in cold weather. Difference in the warm and cool outside built up moisture so this fan circulation is perfect.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Outperformed my expectations
reviews.reviewText: I bought this to use during power outages on hot summer days, but now I use it all the time. I was so impressed with the battery life and quietness that I bought a second one. Really convenient to store and charge. It doesn't rattle or rotate. I like that I can remove the grill to wipe off the blades. My only complaint is, if you're planning to use it while sleeping, the bright blue LED on the back interferes with sleeping. I had to cover the LED with a small piece of electrical tape. Overall, very happy with this little fan.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 20, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This fan is 6", as opposed to the typical 4" ones at Wally World. I have a smaller 4" one from another maker too.The color is bronze, not rose gold. There is no "rose". Its just a "burnished" gold....I stood some 10+ feet in front of it as it blew on high, and could still feel it blowing well. It has a low, off and high switch.My only complaint is that the blades are clear plastic instead of metal. I believe that the vibrating thin plastic is the reason for its loudness. I don't think the decibels are louder than the 4" fan, but the sound is just a bit more abrasive with the plastic blades, if that makes sense.There really aren't too many quiet fans out there, so I wouldn't let the sound stop you from buying it. It gets the job done and is not a horrible sound. If you need a slightly larger fan, to say, sleep with....but your table is 6 feet away. This puppy will blow on you from that distance and you will feel comfortable.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this little amazing tool!
reviews.reviewText: It’s quiet and stylish. I have it connected to one of my monitors at work every day. Going through perimenopause, it makes life so much more pleasant for me.. and for everyone else too. IYKYK. Smart buy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works well and moves a lot of air, but needs a good USB power supply
reviews.reviewText: This fan has a physical rocker switch so you can leave it off or at low speed or high speed. It's not like these "smart" fans that reset to off when plugged in and you have to press a button to cycle through speeds. Once you've set the fan speed it will stay like that forever until you change the switch position yourself. That was my primary reason for buying it.The fan is large and well constructed. It's easy to disassemble if you need to clean or fix something which was a nice surprise.However the fan needs a lot of current. It claims it needs 54mA on the label and that's true at low speed, at high speed it's closer to 63mA. The inrush current is so high that it makes other devices plugged into my USB charger act like they just got plugged in when I turn the fan on because of the resulting voltage drop. I moved it to a better USB charger that can provide more current and now it doesn't have this problem. Be cautious about that.Because of that I would NOT recommend plugging this into a sensitive or expensive device with a USB port like a laptop, phone, game console, etc. Make sure it's plugged into something that can provide a lot of current.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars OMG! Small but MIGHTY
reviews.reviewText: Love this fan it puts out a wonderful and hearty breeze... I love it so I ordered three more...

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Love the color and works really good for my desk

This is a great personal size fan. I run hot at night but don't like to freeze out my spouse and this fan works great to keep me cool and not bother him. It's about as quiet as a fan can get. Very limited motor noise and it looks nice too.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Fan failed to charge, sent them a email about it and quickly responded with a remediation, was able to get a full refund without the hassle of sending the item back
Kann ich weiterempfehlen. Das Teil ist sehr robust und macht sein Job sehr gut 👍

Habe den Ventilator eigentlich zur besseren Luftverteilung zwecks Kaminofen gekauft.Das Teil ist einfach super! Es ist klein, kann aber mit wenigen Griffen als mini-standventilator umgewandelt werden. Hat eine starke Windleistung.

Costa un po' più di altri modelli ma la qualità di percepisce subito.Al minimo rumore quasi impercettibile e se si tiene abbastanza vicino già basta a rinfrescare.Comoda anche la luce regolabile su 3 livelli come pure la velocità.Funziona anche quando è sotto carica.Penso proprio che farò il bis 👍
